Gerald "Groove Machine" Patterson
Active: 1971–1981 · 14 Regional Seminars · 3 VHS Releases
Gerald taught 14 regional seminars before disappearing mid-grapevine at the 1981 Akron Danceworks Expo. Witnesses reported he simply walked off-camera and kept going. Rumored to have opened a macramé shop in Sedona. If you have information, please do not contact us.
